name: Noble Knights
author: Egad
notes:
Really fun deck. I dropped myself to legend 1, and ran it straight to Kog. Only lost a couple of matches.

Just wanted to expand upon this a little more. During my climb I didn't face any spellbooks, I know the hot meme is that they are the hardest matchup for this deck. I faced a bunch of sylvans, amazons, and heroes. Most of those are cakewalks, heroes can be monka-esque if they can dodge the combo of drystan and offerings/tth.
